Find Conflicts Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Right-click a conflicting item in the Project Explorer window and select Find»Conflicts from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to find all items in conflict with a specific item in the project.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • List of conflicts—Lists all conflicts found in the project for the item.
  • Go To—Highlights the selected search result in the Project Explorer window. You also can double-click the result to highlight it.

If the item only has one conflict, LabVIEW highlights the conflict in the Project Explorer window.

You also can use the Find:Conflicts property to find conflicts programmatically.
